Package edu.biu.scapi.comm.twoPartyComm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DestroyDestinationUtil
    This interface provide a way to destroy the queues created by the QueueChannels.
    PartyData
    A marker interface.
    TwoPartyCommunicationSetup
    The TwoPartyCommunicationSetup interface manages the common functionality of all two party communications.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveMQCommunicationSetup
    This class is an example of QueueCommunicationSetup that uses the ActiveMQ implementation of the JMS.
    ActiveMQCommunicationSetup.ActiveMQDestroyer
    A class that delete the ActiveMQ destinations using the ActiveMQ connection.
    LoadQueueParties
    Utility class for reading a list of queue parties from a file.
    LoadSocketParties
    Utility class for reading a list of socket parties from a file.
    NativeChannel  
    NativeSocketCommunicationSetup  
    NativeSocketListenerThread  
    PlainTCPSocketChannel
    This class represents a concrete channel in the Decorator Pattern used to create Channels.
    PlainTCPSocketChannel.Message
    A nested class to use in the send and receive functions.
    QueueCommunicationSetup
    A communication setup class that uses the JMS API for sending and receiving messages.
    QueuePartyData
    This class holds the data of a party in a communication layer.
    SocketCommunicationSetup
    This class implements a communication between two parties using TCP sockets.
    SocketPartyData
    This class holds the data of a party in a communication layer.
    SSLActiveMQCommunicationSetup
    This implementation uses ssl protocol in the JMS queue communication using the ActiveMQ implementation.
    SSLSocketChannel
    This class represents a concrete channel in the Decorator Pattern used to create Channels.
    SSLSocketCommunicationSetup
    This class implements a communication between two parties using SSL sockets.
    TwoPartySocketConnector
    This class manage the socket channels in both two party and multiparty communications.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NativeChannel.State
    A channel has a state.
    PlainTCPSocketChannel.State
    A channel has a state.
